tagOne.title: Enterprise Microservices Container Migration Platform
tagOne.Content: An enterprise-grade microservices architecture built on AWS EKS, enabling seamless migration from monolithic applications to cloud-native architecture. Utilizing Docker containerization, Kubernetes orchestration, and AWS Lambda serverless computing to reduce customer infrastructure costs by 60%.

tagTwo.title: Real-time Big Data Processing and AI Analytics Platform
tagTwo.Content: A real-time data processing platform built with AWS Kinesis, Redshift, and SageMaker, supporting PB-scale data analysis and machine learning model training. Provides financial clients with real-time risk management and intelligent advisory services, improving processing efficiency by 300%.

tagThree.title: Multi-cloud Security Governance and Compliance Management System
tagThree.Content: Enterprise security governance platform based on AWS Security Hub, GuardDuty, and Config. Enables unified security monitoring, automated compliance checks, and threat detection in multi-cloud environments, helping customers achieve SOC2, ISO27001, and other certifications.

tagFour.title: CI/CD Automated Deployment and Operations Platform
tagFour.Content: Fully automated DevOps platform using AWS CodePipeline, CodeBuild, and CodeDeploy. Implements end-to-end automation from code commit to production deployment, increasing deployment frequency by 500% and reducing failure recovery time to minutes.

messages.description: This is a multilingual website built with Nuxt.js and i18n

hero.title: Building future-proof AWS cloud solutions
hero.description: Through enterprise-level AWS cloud services, we help customers significantly reduce infrastructure costs while building highly available and scalable cloud architectures. We accompany customers throughout the entire process from consulting to deployment to promote efficient enterprise transformation.

polygonPos.title: Polygon PoS
polygonPos.description: Supports the most widely used Ethereum scaling ecosystem, providing EVM compatibility and ultimate user experience with fast transactions and near-zero Gas fees.

polygonZkEvm.title: Polygon zkEVM
polygonZkEvm.description: Unlocks Ethereum scalability while maintaining security. The first ZK-rollup offering EVM equivalence, enabling fast transactions and near-zero Gas costs.

miden.title: Miden
miden.description: A decentralized rollup leveraging private data storage and local transaction execution. Scaling better with privacy.

agglayerCdk.title: Agglayer CDK
agglayerCdk.description: Build Ethereum Layer 2 using industry-leading ZK technology and ecosystems.

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Global Intelligent Technology Solutions Provider
hero.description: ZHILING ARK TECHNOLOGY PTE. LTD. is a Singapore-based global intelligent technology solutions provider dedicated to delivering next-generation digital transformation and intelligent automation solutions through advanced cloud computing and AI integration technologies. We build enterprise AI aggregation platforms and intelligent middleware solutions that unify disparate systems, simplify cross-platform data collaboration, and enable large-scale intelligent automated operations.

hero.title: Intelligent Cloud Strategy
hero.content: Leveraging cutting-edge technologies and extensive experience, we deliver tailored cloud computing strategy blueprints that drive digital transformation and build future-ready intelligent IT architectures.

project.title: Comprehensive Cloud Strategy Consulting Services
project.subtitle: End-to-end expert consulting from strategic planning to implementation

itemOne.title: Cloud Strategy Assessment & Planning
itemOne.content: We thoroughly analyze your current state and develop a customized cloud strategy roadmap to ensure digital transformation success. Includes business needs analysis, technology assessment, competitive analysis, and future planning.

itemTwo.title: Cloud Architecture Design & Optimization
itemTwo.content: Design high-availability and scalable cloud technology architectures to ensure system performance and security. Adopts best practices such as microservices architecture, containerized deployment, and automated operations management.

itemThree.title: Cost Optimization Analysis
itemThree.content: Conduct comprehensive analysis of cloud resource usage and provide precise cost optimization recommendations and implementation plans. Maximize cost efficiency through intelligent monitoring and automation.

itemFour.title: Risk Assessment & Governance
itemFour.content: Identify potential risks and develop comprehensive risk mitigation strategies and governance frameworks to ensure security, compliance, and business continuity in the cloud environment.

itemFive.title: Cloud Migration Consulting
itemFive.content: Provide professional cloud migration strategies and implementation guidance to ensure smooth migration of business systems with minimal disruption.

itemSix.title: DevOps Adoption Consulting
itemSix.content: Build comprehensive DevOps processes and toolchains to enable continuous integration (CI) and continuous deployment (CD), enhancing development efficiency and product quality.

processSection.title: Standardized Consulting Process
processSection.subtitle: Applying proven methodologies to ensure high-quality project delivery

one.title: Needs Research & Analysis
one.description: Gain deep insight into business needs, current technology status, and development goals

two.title: Comprehensive Current-State Assessment
two.description: Evaluate the existing IT infrastructure, application systems, and data architecture

three.title: Strategic Planning
three.description: Develop a detailed cloud strategy and implementation roadmap

four.title: Solution Delivery & Implementation
four.description: Provide a complete consulting report and implementation guidance

caseStudiesSection.caseIntro: Real-world cases that demonstrate our professional capabilities and service quality
caseStudiesSection.financeContent: Developed a full-scale cloud transformation strategy including core system migration, data center integration, and security/compliance frameworks. Covered 200+ applications and served over 30 million users.
caseStudiesSection.securityLevelUpgraded: Security Level Upgraded to Financial Grade
caseStudiesSection.manufacturingContent: Built a smart manufacturing cloud platform covering production, supply chain, and sales to enable data-driven lean management. Integrated 50+ factories and 100,000+ devices.
caseStudiesSection.retailContent: Developed an integrated online-offline new retail platform, enabling optimized omnichannel customer experience and targeted marketing. Covered 5,000+ stores and served 20 million+ members.
caseStudiesSection.healthcareContent: Built a secure and reliable healthcare cloud platform for unified medical data management and intelligent analysis. Connected 300+ hospitals and served 10 million+ patients.
caseStudiesSection.educationContent: Built an intelligent online education platform supporting massive concurrency and personalized learning experiences. Served 5 million+ learners across 50+ countries.
caseStudiesSection.logisticsContent: Developed a global smart logistics platform enabling supply chain visualization and intelligent dispatch. Covered 200+ cities and managed 100,000+ vehicles.
